Reviews.Title: “Great hotel - stay here!”
Reviews.Author: Lainee_L
Reviews.Content: spent hours days reading bad reviews paris hotels website finally decided hotels eventually booked stayed hotel nights definitely hotel paris bathrooms clean modern reasonably sized choice breakfast free wifi bonus close metro station near lots shops restaurants look location hotel bit main sights major city public transport efficient reliable cheap paris metro system doesnt tofrom hotel emailed hotel week due arrive hotel via metro station sent prompt useful email requests featherfree bedding due allergies indeed followed definitely recommend stay hotel

Reviews.Title: “I recommend it for business travellers”
Reviews.Author: sbgath
Reviews.Content: stayed hotel recently business trip business class clean tidy quiet bed comfortable plus add rich fresh breakfast staff helpful englishspeaking minor faced temperature didn’t warm wished tv remote control batteries brought downstairs fixed nespresso machine website listed features business class offered dusty englishspeaking tv channels didn’t reception bad picture sound nice clean modern hotel highly recommend especially business travellers matter issue staff help professional visit paris leisure i’d choose centrally located hotel

Reviews.Title: “Great hotel, good location, easy to get to on the Metro”
Reviews.Author: greenday41
Reviews.Content: nice hotel clean nice neighbourhood lot decent restaurants shops nearby theres mcdonalds dont pay prices restaurants staff werent amazing definitely ok fifteen minutes metro eurostar eiffel tower fifteen minutes metro parc des princes five minute walk hotel paris green day concert perfect overall hotels weve stayed id recommend paris

Reviews.Title: “Good Location, Friendly Staff, too many noises”
Reviews.Author: Marie49125
Reviews.Content: bedroom suite facing street construction building hear traffic managed fine ear plugs sewage smell coming day street balcony maid kept spraying febreeze coming everyday central suites clean appointed microwave baby meal staff restaurant downstairs help deal recommend family central paris decent price staff fluent english plus

Reviews.Title: “Good choice when in Paris”
Reviews.Author: mehrdadnb
Reviews.Content: stayed 6 nights hotel hotel bit center actually distance main attractions 12 euros taxi eiffel metro station 2minutes walk hotel port st cloud station hotel choice business leisure neighborhood calm green hotel modern design spacious comparing paris hotels standards stayed bedroom suite 50 sq meters 4 checkin fast easy coming athens quick procedure relief service stay observe major flaws breakfast ok clean service responsive free wireless internet plus hotel believe hotel bit understaffed maybe vacation mentioned didnt affected experience overall nice hotel choice paris recommend

Reviews.Title: “Nice clean friendly Hotel 30 mins by Metro from most of the sights of Paris”
Reviews.Author: Flyerboy01
Reviews.Content: landed cdg train metro hotel little hour stress metro platform greeted pleasant chap reception check helpful stay clean basic reasonable size paris nespresso coffee nice standard coffee facilities available enjoyed stay found breakfast basic nice stayed 3 nights travelled paris metro straight forward average journey times 20 30 mins taxi eiffel tower cost 15 euro roma fc checking departed real distraction partner summary nice pleasant hotel clean hotel comfortable loungebar dinning outdoor terrace centre hotel preferred hotel approx 30 mins sights paris

Reviews.Content: basically hotel renovated loud heading street nice atmosphere disappointed level service preferences checkin mentioned elevator located directly elevators front desk wait time receptionist chatting privately internet access didnt called front desk times mentioned fixed bad service leaves bad flavor
